thread.title: Kinga Kierzkowska
thread.title_full: MiniInTheBox 的点评人 Kinga Kierzkowska

author: Kinga Kierzkowska
title: Kinga Kierzkowska
text: I ordered bodyphone for Samsung s7 edge.on webside is photo and details for Samsung s7 edge but its too small.i complained and wanted money back but company sent me same bodyphone again.now i have two too small bodyphone and i dont have my money.i can put to bin this product.i wasted time.customer service dont help me too much ...on webside still mistake.company lost customer becouse i will never order on this company.0/10
